sentences.en: For the kinder among us did not wish to fret the master, we humoured his partiality.
sentences.cn: 因为我们中间比较心慈的人并不愿惹主人生气, 所以我们就迎合他的偏爱.

sentences.en: He had a partiality for chess.
He has a great partiality for chocolate biscuits.
sentences.cn: 他非常喜欢吃巧克力饼干。

sentences.en: He will surely reprove you If you secretly show partiality.
sentences.cn: 伯13:10你们若暗中徇情、他必要责备你们.

sentences.en: Jeff: Sometimes, the partiality and miscarriage of justice are dis - gusting too.
sentences.cn: 杰夫: 有时, 裁判的不公平和误判也真是令人讨厌的一件事情.

sentences.en: Mr Smith showed partiality to the less troublesome students.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生偏爱那些不大淘气的学生.

sentences.en: Professional women have a partiality for hair - shaping lotion instead of perming.
sentences.cn: 职业妇女偏爱免烫的美发药水.

sentences.en: She has a partiality for exotic flowers.
She is criticized by some others for her one-sidedness and partiality.
sentences.cn: 还有一些人批评她片面、偏心。

sentences.en: The mother's eyes are not always deceived in their partiality.
sentences.cn: 母亲的眼睛是雪亮的,她的偏心不无依据.

sentences.en: The novelist must look on humanity without partiality or prejudice.
sentences.cn: 小说家必须以无偏私无成见的眼光去看待人类.

sentences.en: the problem of partiality in news reporting
sentences.cn: 新闻报道中有失公正的问题

sentences.en: The report accuses the judicial system of inconsistency and partiality.
sentences.cn: 报告指责司法系统执法前后不一且有失公正。

sentences.en: The teacher shows partiality to him.
The umpire showed partiality for that team.
Will you show him partiality ? Will you argue the case for God?
sentences.cn: 8你们要为神徇情 吗 ?要为他争论 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 局部的；偏爱的；不公平的

trans.tran_cn: <正><贬>偏袒，特别喜爱，酷爱，偏心
trans.tran_en: unfair support of one person or one group against another
